name: Mikemon
description: Mikemon appears similar to an Egyptian cat with the Calico cat breed's white, orange tabby and black coloration wearing large reddish brown and brown striped gloves with tan claws sticking out of them. Its ears are large with tufts of reddish brown hair on the tips reminiscent of a caracal ( Caracal caracal ). Its tail is reddish brown with orange stripes with a tuft on the end and lacks a Holy Ring on it.
